title: A Sporting Chance: Hot Down Under
description: In the outback town of Mount Tully, many a man's had to squeeze into a frock after backing the wrong derby cane toad on Australia Day.But Mount Tully's surliest bartender, Jane Hood, has her steel-capped boots planted firmly on the ground, so there's no way she'd risk her independence to accept a saucy bet from the sexy but bossy pub owner, Luka Belov ... is there?This story is rated "Medium Hot" (3 out of 5 flames) and contains F/M pairings.
author: Rhyll Biest
